code: import axios from'axios';const apiUrl="http://localhost:5189";axios.defaults.baseURL=apiUrl;axios.interceptors.response.use(response=>response,error=>{console.error('API Error:',error.response?error.response.data:error.message);return Promise.reject(error);});export default{getTasks:async()=>{const result=await axios.get('/items');return result.data;},addTask:async name=>{console.log('addTask',name);await axios.post('/items',{name:name,isComplete:false});},setCompleted:async(id,isComplete,name)=>{await axios.put("/items/".concat(id),{name:name,isComplete:isComplete});},deleteTask:async id=>{await axios.delete("/items/".concat(id));}};
